snippet: Michael B. Hill, accused of firing shots outside a Decatur elementary school, was carrying 498 rounds of ammunition and a stolen  AK-47, the police said.
abstract: Michael B Hill, man accused of exchanging gunfire with police at a Georgia elementary school, is held without bond on charges that include aggravated assault on a police officer and terroristic threats.
lead_paragraph: Michael B. Hill, accused of firing shots outside a Decatur elementary school, was carrying 498 rounds of ammunition and a stolen  AK-47, the police said.

headline.main: Georgia: Suspect in School Scare Was Heavily Armed, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Suspect In School Scare Was Heavily Armed, Police Say
